node.title: Inugami Korone Teams Up with Sonic for Japanese Exclusive Sonic Frontiers Bonuses
node.description: Sega of Japan announced an exciting collaboration with Hololiveâ€™s very own Inugami Korone to provide incredible bonuses for fans of both the super-fast hedgehog and gamer dog for Sonic Frontiers, which is due to release on November 8th.
